author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Afone Participations To Divest Its Activities In Security
text:
April 10 (Reuters) - AFONE PARTICIPATIONS SA:
* AFONE PARTICIPATIONS SAID ON MONDAY IT HAD SIGNED AN AGREEMENT TO SELL ITS ACTIVITIES IN SECURITY
* DIVESTITED BUSINESS CONTRIBUTED 290,000 EUROS TO CONSOLIDATED RESULT OF CO IN 2017
* REVENUE OF THE DIVISION WAS 6.7 MLN EUROS IN 2017 Source text: bit.ly/2GOdEAG
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
